page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content:
A very high percentage of the population in our area are Protestant and there are churches and chapels of most denominations and the people have the choice to worship in either English or Welsh. However there is a Catholic Church in the town and a well attended Catholic Comprehensive School-St John Lloyd's in our area. Llanelli is not a cosmopolitan society and there are few other religious sects.However,until the 1970's there was a synagogue in the town but this has now closed.
{......by Rhian Griffiths { Claire Wakefield
